upload_file ( $  fn,
$  page,
$  orig_fn = '',
&$  existed = false 
)

move an uploaded file to the shared directory of a page

this function reuses existing files when possible.

Parameters:
string$fnfilename of newly uploaded file (most likely in /tmp)
string$pagepage or pagename
string$orig_fnthe original filename on the client machine (optional)
bool&$existedset to true if the filename returned did already exist before
Returns:
filename inside the shared directory or false in case of error
